column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////The only reason why I took off one star is because of the long wait to get in. Wildberry doesn't take reservations
column2: so if you want to eat there you have to wait it out. The wait is worth it! The pancakes are absolutely divine and the ability to substitute the specialty pancakes for $1 is the best. Their Cinnamon Roll pancakes are by far by favorite
column3: and you don't even really need syrup with them! If you don't mind the long wait
column4: or are lucky enough to have have a short one
column5: you absolutely love your meal and the service is great too!
